thread.title: Microsoft strikes a deal with Asus: We won't sue if you put Office on your An... - InfoWorld
thread.title_full: Microsoft strikes a deal with Asus: We won't sue if you put Office on your An... - InfoWorld - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: InfoWorld
title: Microsoft strikes a deal with Asus: We won't sue if you put Office on your An... - InfoWorld
text:
It's a classic quid-pro-quo move that helps Microsoft expand its Office ecosystem to Asus Android smartphones and tablets Microsoft has apparently traded an agreement not to sue Asustek over its Android patents in exchange for an a deal that will put Office software on Android smartphones and tablets designed by Asus. About a day after Microsoft and Google buried the hatchet with their own patent agreement, Asus and Microsoft also made peace.
 InfoWorld.
